channel.title: How i make myself admin on choob Isle pk v1, i typed 3 in character rights
channel.description:
i was wondering for people that play choob Isle pk v1 how do you make urself admin i typed 3 in charter-right and that didnt do nothing my other server source works on doing that but now this one.
please help

item.title: How i make myself admin on choob Isle pk v1, i typed 3 in character rights
item.dc:creator: @almostsk8er0453 almostsk8er0453
item.description:
@almostsk8er0453 wrote:

ive never had a choob isle source but if theres a data folder go in there abd go to administrtors and put ur self in

Read full topic

item.title: How i make myself admin on choob Isle pk v1, i typed 3 in character rights
item.dc:creator: @EliteKill101 EliteKill101
item.description:
@EliteKill101 wrote:

pie lol it jerks u when ppl say that? u know what u both r wrong even u pie

you are actually supposed to be logged out of your file then go into the character file and set your rights as 0,1,2,3 and then go up to file and save then exit out of the character file and log bak in jeese it isnt complicated at all now is it? lol

Read full topic
item.source: How i make myself admin on choob Isle pk v1, i typed 3 in character rights

item.title: How i make myself admin on choob Isle pk v1, i typed 3 in character rights
item.dc:creator: @pieeater pieeater
item.description:
@pieeater wrote:

on the isle servers, with 3 character right, you are owner (which means you still get all the benefits)but,you don’t get the crown.if you want the crown,just change your right to 2.btw,you don’t have to fuckin compile it erks me when people say to compile on a character right file ffs. you only have to change the right,(keep file open) close ur runserver.bat or w/e urs is named,then save the file(charcacter file) and then you go back on and vauila

Read full topic
item.source: How i make myself admin on choob Isle pk v1, i typed 3 in character rights
